title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 2024
description: All solutions for the November 20 episode. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 2024 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today in November 2024, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of November 2024. We’ve also provide the solutions for all the other regular puzzles and toss-ups for today, and update this article on a daily basis. From November 18 to 22, it will be Holidays Week, so you can expect a few puzzles that will celebrate American history or the military in some way. The game today will include three new contestants: Arlando Barnett, Darcy Hopko, and Miracle Williams. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 20. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, November 20, 2024 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – GLAMOROUS GOWN [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #1 – WHAT’S FOR DINNER? [Phrase] Tossup #2 – ALPINE SKIING [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – CHECKING THE THERMOMETER [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #2 – INITIAL, NAME, AGE [Crossword – Middle What?] Regular Puzzle #3 – PICTURE-PERFECT BEACHES [Places] Tossup #3 – SHORT-SLEEVE SHIRT [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #4 – BERMUDA SHORTS [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #5 – LONG JOHNS [What Are You Wearing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – THE GRAND PRIZE [Thing] And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Tuesday, November 19: Bonus Round Puzzle – MAKING A QUICK DECISION [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – WHAT’S FOR DINNER? [Phrase] Tossup #2 – ALPINE SKIING [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – CHECKING THE THERMOMETER [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #2 – INITIAL, NAME, AGE [Crossword – Middle What?] Regular Puzzle #3 – PICTURE-PICTURE BEACHES [Places] Tossup #3 – SHORT-SLEEVE SHIRT [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #4 – BERMUDA SHORTS [What Are You Wearing?] Tossup #5 – LONG JOHNS [What Are You Wearing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – THE GRAND PRIZE [Thing] The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the November 22 episode. We should also mention that this week from November 18 to November 22, a new contest called Home for the Holidays with LG will be live. This will give viewers a chance to win $5,000 cash and $5,000 to LG.com every night.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of November 2024. We’ve also provide the solutions for all the other regular puzzles and toss-ups for today, and update this article on a daily basis.

From November 18 to 22, it will be Holidays Week, so you can expect a few puzzles that will celebrate American history or the military in some way. The game today will include three new contestants: Arlando Barnett, Darcy Hopko, and Miracle Williams. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 20.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Wednesday, November 20, 2024 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – GLAMOROUS GOWN [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #1 – WHAT’S FOR DINNER? [Phrase]
  • Tossup #2 – ALPINE SKIING [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – CHECKING THE THERMOMETER [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – INITIAL, NAME, AGE [Crossword – Middle What?]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – PICTURE-PERFECT BEACHES [Places]
  • Tossup #3 – SHORT-SLEEVE SHIRT [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #4 – BERMUDA SHORTS [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #5 – LONG JOHNS [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – THE GRAND PRIZE [Thing]

And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Tuesday, November 19:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – MAKING A QUICK DECISION [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – WHAT’S FOR DINNER? [Phrase]
  • Tossup #2 – ALPINE SKIING [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – CHECKING THE THERMOMETER [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – INITIAL, NAME, AGE [Crossword – Middle What?]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – PICTURE-PICTURE BEACHES [Places]
  • Tossup #3 – SHORT-SLEEVE SHIRT [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #4 – BERMUDA SHORTS [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Tossup #5 – LONG JOHNS [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – THE GRAND PRIZE [Thing]

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the November 22 episode. We should also mention that this week from November 18 to November 22, a new contest called Home for the Holidays with LG will be live. This will give viewers a chance to win $5,000 cash and $5,000 to LG.com every night.
